sentences.english: Saturn's newest addition could explain how Cassini Regio came to be.
sentences.chinese: 土星的最新成员可以解释卡西尼雷吉奥出现。

sentences.english: Studying this interaction is one of Cassini's objectives.
sentences.chinese: 这种交互感应的研究是卡西尼的主要目标之一。

sentences.english: Cassini was on its way to Saturn.
sentences.chinese: 当时卡西尼号是在前往土星的途中。

sentences.english: But in orbit around Saturn, Cassini had no such problems.
sentences.chinese: 但是在环绕土星的轨道上，卡西尼就没有这样的问题。

sentences.english: Saturn'snewest addition could explain how Cassini Regio came to be.
sentences.chinese: 土星的最新光环可以解释卡西尼雷吉奥的出现。

sentences.english: Cassini was on a four-year mission to explore the ringed planet.
sentences.chinese: 卡西尼号的4年任务是探索这个环状星球。
